description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6c62v","text":"This protocol can be used for performing HCR Flow-FISH followed by cell/nuclei enrichment via FACS and polymer disassembly on fixed and permeabilized cells and tissue derived nuclei. This protocol should be performed after finalizing \"PERFF-seq: Cell and Nuclei Preparation\" for the desired sample type. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"elrpg","text":"Maintain RNAse free environment when preparing buffers and throughout the protocol by spraying bench with RNaseZap and using molecular grade reagents when possible. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":111,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"22rq1","text":"To increase cell recovery, opt for a swinging bucket rotor when pelleting and leave a few uL of liquid behind when aspirating buffers. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5mhiu","text":"When possible, use low-binding plasticware. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

Instruments)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cbsdj","text":"Wash Buffer (Molecular Instruments) ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aa3uc","text":"Amplification Buffer (Molecular ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ib3g","text":"SSC-T: 5X SSC, 0.1% Tween-20","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-left","offset":0,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2e11q","text":"Sorting \u0026 Collection Buffer: 1x PBS + 5% BSA(Gibco Catalog No: 15260037) + 0.133 U/uL RNase Inhibitor (Sigma Aldrich Catalog No: 15260037)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-left","offset":0,"length":138}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fk1cg","text":"dsDNAse Thermofisher Lot No: EN0771","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-left","offset":0,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2a5da","text":"Storage Buffer: Water + 1x Quenching Buffer + 0.1 Enhancer (warmed for 10 minutes at 65C)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-left","offset":0,"length":89}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fcs6d","text":"Long Term Storage Buffer: Water + 1x Quenching Buffer + 10% Glycerol (Millipore Sigma Catalog No: G5516-100ML) + 0.1 Enhancer (warmed for 10 minutes at 65C)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-left","offset":0,"length":156}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"avghi","text":"Post Storage Processing buffer: 0.5x PBS + 0.02% BSA and 0.2U/uL RNase status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5vbho","text":"After performing cell/nuclei preparation, pre-warm hybridization buffer and thermomixer with a heated lid to  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":109,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6juje","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ckodq","text":"Add 400uL of pre-warmed hybridization buffer per 1 million (1M) cells/nuclei.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"i82r","text":"For cells, incubate in a thermomixer at   for 30 minutes (300rpm shaking) or a rotating hybridization oven.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eek6j","text":"For nuclei, incubate samples at   with no shaking.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":34,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"gamm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"94o78","text":"In the meantime, prepare probe solution for 1M cells/nuclei by adding 8uL of each probe set (8uL from the 1uM probe stock) and top off pre-warmed hybridization buffer to a final volume of 100uL. Increase per cell count and per probe set used. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9dm9e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8vekh","text":"Example: For 5 million cells/nuclei and 2 probe sets: ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":54}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e8i16","text":"Probe solution = 80uL probes (2 probe sets * 8uL * 5 million cells) + 420uL of hybridization buffer ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":100}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3au8","text":"After incubating, add 100uL of the prepared probe mix into each sample for a final probe concentration of 32nM.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"efgv4","text":"Incubate for 16-24 hours. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4umb3","text":"For cells, incubate in a thermomixer at   (300rpm).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"17ivk","text":"For nuclei, incubate samples at   with no shaking.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":34,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"2CC14DCBE61911EEBDBF0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dovqh","text":"After overnight incubation, add 500uL of SSC-T into samples and centrifuge at 850xg for 10 minutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fs79r","text":"Gently remove supernatant (Leaving few uLs behind to make sure not to perturb fragile pellet). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"710fv","text":"Add 500uL of wash buffer per 1M cells/nuclei and incubate at   for 10 minutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aqn3c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"aaj80","text":"Centrifuge at 850xg for 5 minutes and remove supernatant. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"45gud","text":"Repeat steps 8 and 9, 3 more times for a total of 4 washes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bvk9f","text":"Add 500uL of SSC-T per 1M cells/nuclei and incubate for 5 minutes at room temperature to remove formamide from sample.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e4pr7","text":"Centrifuge at 850xg for 5 minutes and remove supernatant. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a4tds","text":"Add 150uL of amplification buffer per 1M cells/nuclei and incubate for 30 minutes at room temperature. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d8sot","text":"In the meantime, transfer 5uL of H1 and H2 hairpins per 1M cells/nuclei for each probe set ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a2ij6","text":"(i.e. 5uL from the 3uM hairpin stock). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"94esl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4jltf","text":"Example: for 5M cells/nuclei and 2 probe sets:","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":46}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4t8ot","text":"Transfer 25uL(5M * 5uL) of h1 and h2 hairpin for each probe set (total of 4 hairpin stocks)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":91}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d54d4","text":"H1 and H2 hairpins are kept in separate tubes at this step.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":59}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d23r0","text":"Heat shock at   for 90 seconds using a thermocycler. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"76iel","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"95","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"53sjg","text":"Remove strip-tubes from thermocycler and incubate at room temperature in the dark for 30 minutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"blstj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6bh73","text":"After incubation, prepare hairpin solution by combining h1 and h2 and adding SSC-T for final hairpin solution of 100uL per 1M cells/nuclei. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"hkov","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8dig","text":"Example: For 5M cells/nuclei and 2 probe sets: ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":47}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8j710","text":"Hairpin solution = 100uL of hairpins (25uL*4 hairpin stocks) + 400uL of amplification buffer ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":93}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fh9av","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"m4gr","text":"Add 100uL of hairpin solution to each sample for a final hairpin concentration of 60nM and incubate at least 4 hours or overnight at  or  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":133,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":137,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7cd6o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"305gp","text":"For cells, 300rpm shaking","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dvere","text":"For nuclei, no shaking","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":11,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"25","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"8AB87E5EE61A11EEBDBF0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2hju7","text":"To wash unbound hairpins, add 500uL of SSC-T and centrifuge at 850xg for 5 minutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"49esb","text":"Repeat step 20, 4 more times for a total of 5 washes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cohv","text":"If fluorophore multiplexing is performed, compensation should be done using single color control samples and unstained cells/nuclei that went through the PERFF-seq protocol. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5o8hl","text":"Re-suspend cells/nuclei in collection buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eih93","text":"Ideally, cells/nuclei should be filtered through a 35um filter before sorting.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1nt3s","text":"Stopping point: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4k4m0","text":"Alternatively, samples can be resuspended in storage buffer (1mL per 5 million, see Materials section or 10XG protocol for more details). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"97t9j","text":"Cells or nuclei can be stored for up to 1 week at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4fqod","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8hj9r","text":"After sorting, centrifuge cells/nuclei at 850xg for 5 minutes and gently remove supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f4v09","text":"Resuspend in 275uL of 1x DNase I buffer at   for 15 minutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fifcf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"12q2a","text":"Record the amount of cells/nuclei recovered from sorting.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8p9aq","text":"30uL 10x DNase I buffer + 270uL of RNase free water --\u003e Add 275uL to sample ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ddp35","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2m5tv","text":"Add 25uL of DNase I enzyme (0.5U/ul enzyme in 1x buffer) to solution and incubate at   for 2 hours.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":85,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"11bqe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"babq3","text":"Inactivate DNase I by incubating the sample at   for 5 minutes in the presence of 10 mM DTT (final).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":47,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2c701","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"55","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"34cet","text":"Centrifuge at 850xg for 5 minutes to pellet cells/nuclei.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"79b9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"69gj7","text":"Re-suspend in 500uL wash buffer and incubate at   for 10 minutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4surr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f3i8g","text":"Repeat steps 28 and 29 for a total of 2 washes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d20uh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
